value.title: StarCraft 2: Is This REALLY The ULTIMATE Terran Army?! (Dark vs Cure)
value.excerpt: Professional match of StarCraft 2 between Dark (Zerg) and Cure (Terran). While this game starts off with a Roach Ravager rush it quickly turns into a long macro game where both players make their ultimate armies. value.title: StarCraft 2: Pro Gamers Using MAPHACKS!
